recipesJson.name: White Girl Wasted
recipesJson.author: Thadentman
recipesJson.description: My version of Hpnotiq ... for an Incredible Hulk add .5% more cognac. There is nothing more that I would like to do then to show off my extensive flavor note skills but...maybe next time :)

reviews.text: Loving This.The perfect mix of passion fruit, mango, sweet, and an undercurrent of cognac. This stuff is bang on to my sense memory of Hypnotiq. Very nicely done! Slaughtered 30ml in no time flat.
Very good balance , being that I'm recovering the alcohol taste here is quite comforting. Very enjoyable and authentic.
Even though i hate alcohol i love this stuff. really good mango notes good job dent.
